altTitles.ko: 로얄아카데미의 불규칙마법~빈민가 출신 최강의 마법사가 로열스 학원에서 타의 추종을 불허합니다~

description.en:
A Manga adaptation of the Light Novel *The Irregular of the Royal Academy of Magic*.  
  
"Magic." A sacred mystery usable only by those chosen. One day, a child from the slums named Arus finds he has the power to use magic. A sorcerer by the name of Genos Willzard learns of his talent and raises him, turning him into the greatest of assassins. One day, Genos gives him an order: To enroll at the Magic Academy…?!  


---
description.id:
Sihir, misteri yang hanya bisa digunakan oleh orang-orang terpilih. Suatu hari, seorang anak yang berasal dari desa kumuh bernama Ars, menyadari bahwa dirinya memiliki kekuatan sihir. Seorang penyihir bernama Genos Wilzard menemukan bakatnya itu, lalu membesarkannya untuk menjadikannya sebagai pembunuh terkuat. Bagaimana ya kisahnya ketika Genos menyuruhnya masuk ke Akademi Sihir…!?  
  
[Link Novel](https://volkanscans.com/manga/the-youngest-student-of-the-royal-academy-of-magic-the-strongest-wizard-who-emerges-from-the-poor-city-slums-unmatched-in-a-academy-full-of-nobles-web-novel-indonesian/)
